scripts.itai-migrate-db-schema: C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysqldump.exe -u root --no-data site1 > schema.sql && copy C:\xampp\htdocs\site1\wordpress\schema.sql C:\xampp\htdocs\site1\wordpress\db
scripts.itai-migrate-db-data: C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysqldump.exe -u root site1 > data.sql && copy C:\xampp\htdocs\site1\wordpress\data.sql C:\xampp\htdocs\site1\wordpress\db
scripts.migrate-db: npm run migrate-db-data && npm run migrate-db-schema
